virtual void iprop::IPropertiesManager::InsertAttribute ( iser::IObject *  objectPtr,
const std::string &  attributeId,
const std::string &  attributeDescription,
int  attributeFlags,
bool  releaseFlag 
) [pure virtual]

Insert an attribute into the object.

Parameters:
objectPtrAttribute data object.
attributeIdUnique ID of the attribute in the attributes repository.
attributeDescriptionHuman readable description of the attribute.
attributeFlagsAttribute flags.
See also:
IProperty::AttributeFlags.
Parameters:
releaseFlagIndicate who control the attribute's memory. If releaseFlag is true, the control over the objectPtr will be overtaken by this object.

Implemented in iprop::CPropertiesManager.
